sense.gloss: to be wounded, to get injured
to get damaged, to get chipped, to get scratched

sdata.j: ↑恋↑↓こい↓とは↑巨大↑↓きょだい↓な↑矛盾↑↓むじゅん↓であります。それなくしては↑生↑↓い↓きられず、しかもそれによって|↑傷↑↓きず↓つく|。
sdata.e: Love is a great contradiction. You cannot live without it but at the same time you will be hurt by it.

sdata.j: |↑傷↑↓きず↓つく|のが↑嫌↑↓いや↓だとか↑言↑↓い↓ってたら↑恋愛↑↓れんあい↓なんてできないよ。
sdata.e: If you don't want to get hurt, then love and romance are not for you.

sdata.j: ↑分↑↓わ↓かってないなあ。そんなこと↑言↑↓い↓ったら↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓は|↑傷↑↓きず↓つく|に↑決↑↓き↓まってんじゃん。
sdata.e: You don't get it. If you say stuff like that, you're bound to hurt the girl's feelings.
